title: Commission Decision of 17 January 1997 deferring, as regards the importation of ornamental plant propagating material and ornamental plants from third countries, the date referred to in Article 16 (2) of Council Directive 91/682/EEC
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 17 January 1997 deferring, as regards the importation of ornamental plant propagating material and ornamental plants from third countries, the date referred to in Article 16 (2) of Council Directive 91/682/EEC (97/108/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The date referred to in Article 16 (2), first subparagraph of Directive 91/682/EEC is hereby deferred until 31 December 1998.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 January 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 376, 31. 12. 1991, p. 21.
(2) OJ No L 28, 7. 2. 1995, p. 10.
